/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that are characteristic of Beijing. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a human element to the otherwise architectural landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the background. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
